Build notes

Some helpful notes about building the various components.

pkgdown

prep_articles("vignettes")

pkgdown::build_site(devel = TRUE, lazy = TRUE, preview = FALSE)
pkgdown::build_site()


pkgdown::build_home_index(); pkgdown::init_site()
pkgdown::build_articles()

rmarkdown::render("vignettes/miscellanea.Rmd", output_format = "all")

workflow(); .metayer(); knitr_set_config()
# knitr::knit("vignettes/miscellanea.Rmd", "vignettes/miscellanea.md")
pkgdown::build_home_index(); pkgdown::init_site()
pkgdown::build_article("miscellanea")

workflow(); .metayer(); knitr_set_config()
pkgdown::build_home_index(); pkgdown::init_site()

metayer

R CMD build .
VERSION=0.2.4 \
R CMD check metayer_${VERSION}.tar.gz
